#summary Example: Creating a data source client

= Example: Creating a data source client =

== 1. Creating Service interface ==
Service's interface for datasource client can be created by three way:
  * using codegen's das plugin
  * from wsdl
  * from datasourcefile directly

=== 1.1. Using codegen's das plugin ===

To generate service interface start codegen:

{{{
staff_codegen -pdas -tinterface staff.das.samples.Accounts
}}}

Service interface will be generated in Accounts.h

=== 1.2. Using wsdl ===

Get wsdl from http://localhost:9090/axis2/services/staff.das.samples.Accounts?wsdl and save as staff.das.samples.Accounts.wsdl;

generate interface:
{{{
staff_codegen -pwsdl -tinterface staff.das.samples.Accounts.wsdl
}}}

Service interface will be generated in Accounts.h

=== 1.3. From datasourcefile directly ===

To generate service interface start codegen:

{{{
staff_codegen -pdasdatasource -tinterface Accounts.datasources
}}}

Service interface will be generated in Accounts.h

== 2. Implement client ==

Follow the [ExampleCalculatorClientLinux#3._Generating_client_stub Linux guide] or [ExampleCalculatorClientWindows#3._Generating_client_stub Windows guide] to continue.
